Name: curl
Notes:
github release page doesn't seem to have windows downloads, so still need to go to real page
https://curl.se/
InstallScript:
$result = $context.ExtractArchive()
if ($result -ne 0) { return $result }
# just open folder so we can copy the file whereever we want it:
explorer.exe $context.DownloadFolder

Name: Kindle
Notes: v1.24 is the last one that DeDRM can decrypt so make sure not to update it (https://www.mobileread.com/forums/showthread.php?t=283371)
PostInstallMessage: before running Kindle app, rename that render-test.exe, then disable network to prevent it auto-updating itself, then in app settings, disable auto-updates (and probably want to change content location, too)

Name: VirtualBox
Notes:
hashes: https://www.virtualbox.org/download/hashes/___VERSION___/SHA256SUMS
installer now checks for some python package and complains if it's not found
so first need to install python (if haven't already), and install the pip package "pywin32"
and it doesn't work with the MS store version of python, have to use the non-store version

Name: VirtualBoxExtensions
vlc
Notes:
update check calls: http://update.videolan.org/vlc/status-win-x64
have their own git server: git://git.videolan.org/vlc.git or https://code.videolan.org/videolan/vlc.git (??)

Name: WinDbg
Notes:
not on store anymore; downloads an "appinstaller" which in turn downloads an msix
it autoupdates; can turn off in Windows Settings->Apps->Installed Apps->WinDbg, but meh
